// src/App.js import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; // import { ThemeProvider, useTheme } from './context/ThemeContext'; import './index.css'; function URLThemeHandler() { const { changeTheme } = useTheme(); useEffect(() => { // Read theme from URL query parameter: ?theme=dark const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); const urlTheme = params.get('theme'); if (urlTheme) { changeTheme(urlTheme); } }, [changeTheme]); return null; } function AppContent() { const [complianceStatus, setComplianceStatus] = useState(null); const checkCompliance = () => { // Mock compliance check const isCompliant = Math.random() > 0.5; setComplianceStatus({ compliant: isCompliant, message: isCompliant ? 'All compliance requirements met!' : 'Compliance issues detected', details: [ { check: 'Security Headers', passed: isCompliant }, { check: 'Data Encryption', passed: true }, { check: 'Access Controls', passed: isCompliant }, { check: 'Audit Logging', passed: true }, ] }); }; return (
{/* Header */}

Compliance Checker

{/* Main Content */}
{/* Welcome Card */}

Welcome to Compliance Checker

Verify your system's compliance with industry standards and regulations. Click the button below to run a comprehensive compliance check.

{/* Action Card */}
{/* Results */} {complianceStatus && (
{complianceStatus.compliant ? ( ) : ( )}

{complianceStatus.message}

{complianceStatus.compliant ? 'Your system meets all compliance requirements.' : 'Please review the failed checks below.'}

{/* Details */}

Detailed Results:

{complianceStatus.details.map((detail, index) => (
{detail.check} {detail.passed ? 'Passed' : 'Failed'}
))}
)} {/* Info Cards */}

Security

Industry-standard security protocols and encryption

Compliance

Meet regulatory requirements and industry standards

Reporting

Comprehensive reports and audit trails

); } function App() { return ( ); } export default App;
